item.title: Will AI Completely Replace Human Developers?
item.description: Abstract The rapid development of artificial intelligence (AI) has left a profound mark on the software development industry. AI code generation tools are emerging, automatically generating code to improve efficiency and reduce costs. However, whether AI will completely replace human developers is still a controversial topic. Should developers be worried about being replaced by AI?** This question has been the focus of discussion for some time. Some people believe that AI will eventually achieve full automation of software development, putting developers at risk of unemployment.
